title: @KateyKhaos/@Riot Baconhawk SG Rumble SKIN BUG
body:
As I was recently made aware of (even though using the skin from time to time), it seems as Super Galaxy Rumble's overheat drill has been bugged for almost a year now, which is quite sad. Instead of the special drill he uses during overheat, it is featuring the regular non-overheat drill during this mode.

Posting a couple of threads for further explanation:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/8ukEpe6U-super-galaxy-rumble-overheat-drill-visual-bug?comment=00000000
^Most recent one, which I'm trying to highlight as it ACTUALLY isn't fixed yet.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4846606&page=1#post49846033
^This one was commented by a Rioter in september last year, but it seems like it may have been forgotten or overlooked.

So I'm hoping that we'll get some further explanation on what happened and what will happen.

replies.body:
Hey Garurumon! 

I'm happy to report that we've found the root cause of the issue (which wasn't what we initially thought), and we believe we have a fix! Unfortunately, this won't be fixed for the next patch (Patch 5.11) But, if all goes well,  you should be seeing the fix on PBE shortly. 

Again, I'm super sorry for the delay on this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=iro0EOzd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-05T16:42:46.210+0000)
>
> Hey Garurumon! 
> 
> I'm happy to report that we've found the root cause of the issue (which wasn't what we initially thought), and we believe we have a fix! Unfortunately, this won't be fixed for the next patch (Patch 5.11) But, if all goes well,  you should be seeing the fix on PBE shortly. 
> 
> Again, I'm super sorry for the delay on this issue.

Weeh! What a great thing! (also some attention for it was pretty neat), as it has sorta gone under the radar for a long time.

I hope that I can speak for all of us when I say that it will make our Rumble plays more more clarified ;)
